sqlMap.select:
SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM (
SELECT unq, category, ctgtype, ctggender, price, csize, color, thumbnail, substr(name,0,20) name FROM goodsinfo ORDER BY unq DESC
) a ) b
WHERE $s_field$ LIKE '%$s_text$%'
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO USERINFO( USERID, PASS, NAME, BIRTH, PHONE, EMAIL, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, RDATE, UDATE ) VALUES ( #userid#, #pass#, #name#, #birth#, #phone#, #email#, #zipcode#, #address1#, #address2#, sysdate, sysdate )
